website_summaries.verdict: A smartly designed dishwasher that features a little more than the other countertop models.
pros: Although this unit is small enough to work on your countertop, it has 7 different wash cycles, a delayed start feature, and a handy LED display
Additionally, this model includes both a water supply warning indicator and a rinse aid warning indicator
cons: There may be an issue with quality control as minor miscellaneous issues occasionally slip through

customer_reviews.title: Why do the dishes when this can do them for you!?
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop using it after two loads... because I ran out of dirty dishes. And after I had bought this, I stopped doing dishes until it came. Holds a lot, and coming from someone who is very lazy about cleaning off dishes before putting them in, just get the real big or solid things and leave the rest the the dishwasher. I am so happy that I don't have to do the dishes any more. Oh and also the front and sides (probably the top too) are magnetic so I use mine like a fridge. Now I need one of those dirty/clean magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H

customer_reviews.title: It sucks because I just really want to be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a nightmare. I have a similar issue as other reviewers with compatibility issues between the newer "hose" sink head attachments and this product. Adapters that are for potable water that fit between the quick connect on the dishwasher to my sink have been difficult to find and when found have not been suitable for use. It sucks because I just really want to be able to use this in my apartment instead of having it sit on the floor and take up so much space. Will update this review if I ever am successful at finding a viable adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Wong

customer_reviews.title: Does a Great Job
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Installation is easy BUT I strongly suggest the use of that Teflon plumbers tape to make the connections as watertight as possible. We had a couple of “events” but it all seems good now. So far we have used it maybe 4 times and it has the feeling of a solid product and it does as good a job as any of the big dishwashers.
customer_reviews.author: Reynard Foxe

customer_reviews.title: It does an amazing job.
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the better dish washers I've had in my life and that's kind of sad really. Definitely love it and had no issues with it so far. One good note like some others have pointed out is that when its done open the door and let the dishes air dry for 15 minutes. The dishes will be so hot right after its finished that any water/moisture will be gone within 5 minutes of opening the door. There is no vent on smaller units like this to let the moisture out so you must do this unless you don't mind wet dishes hours later.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: it actually means more like 75min. Cannot fit my large plates upright in ...
customer_reviews.text: Almost two years old now, no problems with it all. Works well, although the timer on the machine is not true to time. i.e. if it says 60min, it actually means more like 75min. Cannot fit my large plates upright in it, but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: LisaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for studio apartment. (Almost) NO MORE DISHES!
customer_reviews.text: I can't fit everything in this little machine, so it hasn't completely eliminated dishes but has made kitchen cleanup 99% easier. Monitor the drain connection when you first turn it on as it leaked a bit the first time I used it and one other time about a month later, but now that I've made the adjustment to the washing routine I have no fear of leaving it on in my apartment when I'm not home. 5-Stars though because it really well even though it has slight limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Makenna Murray

customer_reviews.title: Broke down in 15 months
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a perfect solution for my small space and for a short while it was. But then it started acting up. Didn't drain properly which ended up causing a flood on my counter top. It happened just after the warranty ran out of course. Support made suggestions on how to clear the problem which did not work at all. The factory which shipped it to me does not do any repairs. Parts were available for somewhere else to replace them, but the cost was far more than the original unit and the repair shop did not recommend even trying. Will not be buying this again..
customer_reviews.author: Sonoftow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a life saver! Works great fits on my tiny counter and is very quiet! Well, except for when it drains into the sink but that doesn't really bother anyone, just sounds like somebody is dumping water. I recommend this to anyone on the fence about it! It saves me so much time.
customer_reviews.author: PyrettaBlaze

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: This dishwasher made such an impression on my neighbor that she ordered one the very day I received mine and she loves hers as much as I do. It sits at the end of the counter and the hose tucks out of the way beside the washer. There is almost no sound because this is a quality machine. I would highly recommend this to anyone with an apartment or little space.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Ran

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great!!! Changed my life for the better. I am so glad I am not hand washing all my dishes anymore. You can fit a lot in there. I also like that it sterilizes where hand washing does not.
customer_reviews.author: C J M

customer_reviews.title: What a waste
customer_reviews.text: I got an E4 error after the second load ever! And there is no leak as it claims. Most likely returning it the manual doesn't even explain how to resolve the issue!
customer_reviews.author: jenni

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: This is very up and down for me. Well for starters the dishwasher came dented. And it does not clean very well. You’ve literally got to run the dishwasher twice. Leaves a lot of soap scum even with the jet dry. Maybe look into a better brand for the price. Couldn’t believe it was dented. Lotta weird little ticks with this.
customer_reviews.author: Cora and Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Enogh for two people. I usually do pots by hand because they take so much space. Other than that the machine works fine and can use it on the counter.

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher
